description: Delete a job production plan service type unit of measure cohort link

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to delete the cohort link.

permissions: Requires access to the associated job production plan via delegated authorization.
side_effects: Deletes a job production plan service type unit of measure cohort link.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument for the job production plan service type unit of measure cohort. --confirm must be set to proceed.
